snippet.title: Minecraft x Batman DLC
snippet.description:
Gotham City is in trouble but have no fear – Batman is here! Fly through the night as the Caped Crusader and save the city from Harley Quinn, The Joker, The Penguin, and more dastardly Super-Villains from the DC universe. Explore the legendary Batcave, utilize the Bat-Gadgets in your Utility Belt, and complete perplexing puzzles to repair the sabotaged Nether Portal and save Alfred! Become the Dark Knight of Minecraft here: https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/marketplace/pdp?id=f5e31f4d-2c8e-4b84-808d-05928747d9c7

AUDIO DESCRIPTION: https://youtu.be/7X--rY6mEXE?t=3789
